value.title: THE DEPOT STRATEGY TO BREAK ZERG BRAINS | Florencio Files #282 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I cast one of the mysterious and deranged StarCraft 2 builds of the one and only, Florencio, the dude that invented the Protoss proxy nexus recall rush. In this episode, the Sewer Mermaid has a very good strat that deals a lot of damage. But is it enough against such a good opponent?  🧜Florencio Files
